  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86117</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86117</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elasticity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élasticité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elasticidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elasticità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαστικότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elasticidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the extension of a wire with force. At the elastic limit, the wire stays stretched even when the force is removed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elasticity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">line graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stretching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Extension einer 
Leitung mit Kraft. An der elastischen Grenze dehnten die Leitung
Aufenthalte aus, selbst wenn die Kraft gelöscht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre l'extension d'un fil 
avec la force. À la limite d'élasticité, les séjours de fil 
se sont étendus même lorsque la force est enlevée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a extensão de um fio 
com força. No limite elástico, o fio permanece esticado mesmo 
quando a força é removida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra l'estensione di un 
legare con forza. Al limite di elasticità, i soggiorni del 
legare hanno allungato anche quando la forza è rimossa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει την 
επέκταση ενός καλωδίου με τη δύναμη. Στο ελαστικό όριο, το
καλώδιο μένει τεντωμένο ακόμα και όταν αφαιρείται η δύναμη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la extensión de un 
alambre con la fuerza. En el límite elástico, el alambre 
permanece estirado incluso cuando se quita la fuerza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elastische Grenze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
